roleset.name: admire, revere
roleset.note: VENERATE-V NOTES: Frameset created by Jena. Member of Vncls admire-31.2. Other members include admire, adore, cherish, distrust, envy, favor, grudge, loathe, pity, relish, savor, tolerate, value, and worship. (from venerate.01-v)

example.text: Traditions such as * venerating the gods...
